articles.title: WH praises SCOTUS ruling upholding TN ban on transgender treatments: ‘Victory for America’s children’ - Fox News
articles.description: Karoline Leavitt applauds Supreme Court for protecting 'America's innocent children' in transgender case
articles.content:
The White House on Thursday praised the Supreme Courts ruling that a Tennessee law banning puberty blockers and other treatments for transgender minors did not violate the Fourteenth Amendment.

articles.author: Mary Schlangenstein, Leen Al-Rashdan
articles.title: American, United Pause Middle East Flights on Rising Tension - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: American Airlines Group Inc. suspended daily flights from the US to the capital of Qatar, while United Airlines Holdings Inc. paused service to Dubai because of military actions and heightened tensions in the Middle East.
